text: Judith Adele Finnegan (born 16 May 1948) is an English television presenter and writer. ==Works== She co-hosted the ITV weekday daytime show This Morning (1988-2001, 2019) and the Channel 4 talk show, Richard and Judy (2001-2008) with her husband, Richard Madeley. Her new novel Eloise, published in 2012, was a bestseller for the Sunday Times. Her second novel, I Don't Sleep, was published in 2015. Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:20th- century English writers Category:English television presenters
title: Judy Finnigan
